wordGroup: film boiling [物理化学]膜状沸腾
boiling temperature 沸点，沸腾温度
boiling hot 滚烫的；炎热的
initial boiling point 初馏点；初沸点
boiling point elevation 沸点升高
normal boiling point 标准沸点

sentences.en: The water was bubbling and boiling away.
sentences.cn: 水在咕嘟咕嘟地沸腾着。

sentences.en: Steam rose from the boiling kettle.
sentences.cn: 壶里的水开了，冒着蒸汽。
